title: How many free books I get on buying a Kindle? - Quora

response.answer_text: Kindle is an ebook reader, it does NOT give you free books. Kindle Unlimited is a PAID membership which gives you lots of free books (these are mainly popular titles and some lower value books, I have not used KU yet but I don't think you will find many really good books for free; it's just a promotional scheme) Kindle is still a good option to save money on books as Kindle copies are in .mobi format and are much cheaper than paperbacks

None, unless there is some free promotion going it, but Amazon has many free books on the Kindle store. So you don't get free ebooks on buying the Kindle but you do get access to many free ebooks on the Kindle store once you buy the e-reader.
